    • Method Detail

      • canCreateTransfer

        boolean canCreateTransfer()
        Returns a boolean indicating if the transfer can take place. Will return false if amount to be transfered is greater than the amount currently paid on the source.

      • createTransfer

        void createTransfer()
        Creates the transfer transaction, which for now is always a PaymentDistributed transaction between the source account and the target policy.

      • getTransferTransaction

        TransferTransaction getTransferTransaction()
        Returns:
        The transaction executed by this FundsTransfer.

      • getOpenApprovalActivity

        FundsXferApprActivity getOpenApprovalActivity()
        Description copied from interface: ActivityApprovable
        Looks up and returns, if any, the open approval activity for this activity approvable.
        Specified by:
        getOpenApprovalActivity in interface ActivityApprovable<FundsXferApprActivity>
        Returns:
        The open approval activity if any, or null otherwise.

        The associated FundsTransferApprovalHandler.
